pullRequest.title: HADOOP-17032. Fix getContentSummary in ViewFileSystem to handle multiple children mountpoints pointing to different filesystems
pullRequest.bodyText: HADOOP-17032. Handle an internal dir in viewfs having multiple children mount points pointing to different filesystems

nodes.bodyText:
The logics here are introduced for InternalDirOfViewFs,
I feel rather than touching the normal API, you can implement getContentSummary() in InternalDirOfViewFs and have your logic there, That is how all API's which have specific logic for Internal Links are handling. Lets keep the design that way only.
The only thing that you would need there is fsState which isn't there as of now, that you can pass through the constructor, In HDFS-15427, it is being passed, so you can utilize that fsState and independently implement it in InternalDirOfViewFs
